puakma.addin.mail
Class MailTransferThread

java.lang.Object
  puakma.addin.mail.MailTransferThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorDetect, pmaThreadInterface
public class MailTransferThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements pmaThreadInterface, ErrorDetect

This class is responsible for transferring mail to the appropriate smtp host The thread processes ONE message, then dies.
